titleStmt.title: Teares on the death of Moeliades
titleStmt.author: Drummond, William, 1585-1649.

notesStmt.note: Another issue, with title reimposed, omitting Drummond's name, of STC 7257.
Item at reel 1601:16 bound with STC 7254: Drummond, William. Poems. Located between the two sections of STC 7254.
Reproductions of the original in the Bodleian Library.
